title: Blazing 5 – Week 3
itunes:title: Blazing 5 – Week 3
description:
Coming off of an impressive 4-1 week, Colin talks to RJ Bell of Fox Sports Radio and Pregame.com to find out which of his Blazing 5 picks for week 3 the wise guys in Las Vegas agree or disagree with.  Plus, they reveal a bonus pick exclusive to this podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
